operation.descriptionCdata:
464e97d8-80dd-483f-806a-44d4e9b19f76.description=
Merge the contents of 2 JSON arrays. 

This operation does not modify either of the input arrays. The result is the contents or array1 and array2, merged
into a single array. 

Inputs\:
    array1 - String representation of a JSON array. Arrays in JSON are comma seperated lists of objects, enclosed in square brackets ( [ ] ).
Examples\: [1,2,3] or ["one","two","three"] or [{"one"\:1, "two"\:2}, 3, "four"]
    array2 - String representation of a JSON array. Arrays in JSON are comma seperated lists of objects, enclosed in square brackets ( [ ] ).
Examples\: [1,2,3] or ["one","two","three"] or [{"one"\:1, "two"\:2}, 3, "four"]


Responses\:
    success - The operation completed as stated in the description.
    failure - The operation failed. See the message in returnResult for details


Results\:
    returnResult - String representation of the new JSON array with the contents of array1 and array2.
operation.name: Merge Arrays

scriptlet.name: Operation Merge Arrays (bb90984b-d538-42ad-bb3b-93feaca2be6a)
